# Hospitcal Costs Analysis

```{r packages}
library("robmixglm")
library("magrittr")
library("dplyr")
```


```{r datawrangling}
data("hospcosts", package ="robmixglm")

data = hospcosts %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(y = costs) %>% 
  dplyr::select(-id, - costs, -los)
```

## Robust Plots

```{r fitRobStab}
resamplePaper = NA

hospRobStab = model_space(data = data,
                          B = 100,
                          m = 50,
                          nStrata = 5,
                          family = Gamma(link = log))
```

```{r sVIP}
hospMPP = sMPP(robStab = hospRobStab)
hospMPP$plots$dev

```

```{r sMPP}
hospVIP = sVIP(robStab = hospRobStab)
hospVIP$plots$dev

```
